long_description:
Connect Claude to your Metabase instance with 134 specialized tools.

**Features:**
- SQL execution & AI-powered generation
- Dashboard creation & automation
- Schema exploration & relationship detection
- User & permission management
- Query performance analytics
- Collection & bookmark management
- Embedding & visualization controls
- Export/import workspace migration

Requires a running Metabase instance with API access.

metabase_api_key.title: Metabase API Key
metabase_api_key.description: API Key for authentication (recommended). Generate from Metabase Admin > Settings > API Keys
